entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
